radiographic_examinations.findings: No abnormalities except for the presence of tiny pleural effusions.
Increased interstitial markings with air-space opacities in the middle and lower regions of both lungs.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Progression from normal findings to increased interstitial markings and air-space opacities.

radiographic_examinations.findings: Patchy interstitial opacities and air-space opacities in the middle and lower regions of both lungs and small, bilateral pleural effusions.
Moderate pleural effusions, a small pericardial effusion, and patchy air-space opacities in the lower lobes, the lingula, and the right upper lobe.
Same bilateral pleural effusions, small pericardial effusion, and right-upper-lobe and lingular opacities; basilar atelectasis slightly improved.
Periventricular areas of low attenuation, consistent with small-vessel disease, and generalized prominence of the ventricles, sulci, and subarachnoid spaces, suggestive of moderate atrophy.
